title: Ukraine developing independent AI system with Google open technology, ministry says
description: Ukraine is developing a large language model using Google's open-weight Gemma framework, aiming to create an independent system for artificial intelligence operations amid rising demand across military and civilian sectors, the country's digital ministry and mobile operator Kyivstar said on Monday.
content:
The project will use Google's computing infrastructure for initial training before shifting entirely to local infrastructure, ensuring Ukraine retains full control over AI systems accessed by 23 million citizens daily.

title: ‘Embrace the spoiler.’ How AI is driving bid to elect independents : NPR
description: Using artificial intelligence to identify Congressional districts where independent candidates could win, an organization called the Independent Center is aiming to disrupt the two-party system.

title: SoftBank’s Son ‘Cried’ About Nvidia Stake Sale to Fund AI Bets
description: SoftBank Group Corp. founder Masayoshi Son said he wouldn’t have sold off Nvidia Corp. shares if his company had unlimited money to bankroll its next investments in artificial intelligence, which include a big bet on OpenAI.
content:

title: LNXEX and MacroMT Form Strategic Partnership to Build an Intelligent Financial Ecosystem
description: New York, November 2025 — Against the backdrop of increasing convergence in global financial technology and the continued refinement of regulatory frameworks, LNXEX Exchange has announced an expanded strategic partnership with Macro Technology Group (MacroMT). The two parties aim to jointly build an intelligent financial ecosystem centered on artificial intelligence (AI), blockchain, and contract trading, […]

title: Accenture dubs 800,000 staff ‘reinventors’ amid shift to AI
description: Consultancy’s move to embrace artificial intelligence follows Disney’s use of the term ‘imagineers’
content:
Accenture has reportedly begun calling its 800,000 employees “reinventors”, as the consultancy tries to position itself as a leader in artificial intelligence.

title: Supreme Court entrusts CBI with pan-India probe into digital arrest cases, asks States to accord assent
description: The Supreme Court has ordered a nationwide CBI investigation into digital arrest scams. It also questioned the RBI on why Artificial Intelligence is not being used to freeze accounts of cyber criminals. The court noted that senior citizens are often targeted. Information Technology intermediaries must cooperate with the CBI.
content:

title: Humanoid robots will take over factory jobs within 5 years: Xiaomi CEO
description: Xiaomi CEO Lei Jun says artificial intelligence will overhaul traditional industries within five years as humanoid robots move into core factory roles.
content:
Xiaomi CEO Lei Jun has offered one of his strongest predictions yet about the future of manufacturing, telling Beijing Daily that the next five years will bring a major shift powered by artificial intelligence.

title: India CBI probe, issues sweeping directions to states, agencies
description: Top court issues notice to RBI, seeking explanation on why artificial intelligence or machine learning technologies are not being deployed to promptly freeze bank accounts used in cyber frauds.
content:
The Supreme Court on Monday directed the Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) to first probe pan-India cases linked to the emerging ‘digital arrest’ scam.

title: In An Age Of AI Anxiety, Construction Stands Apart From The Rest
description: A new kind of anxiety is spreading: the fear of being replaced by artificial intelligence. Amid this wave of disruption, the construction sector stands apart.
